about_the_game:
Ultra Cop is a short and challenging old-school first/third-person action game taking loving inspiration from the 90's greats on both PC and consoles of the time.

In the not too distant future, South Africa enters the second Crime War. 

As an enhanced Ultra Cop you are tasked with bringing down gangs and syndicates alike.

You're not here to arrest anyone. The protocol is simple: ZERO TOLERANCE

Law & Order has fallen, and you have to pick it up.

Clean the streets, one bullet at a time.

Use an array of weapons ranging from the Battle Mech, Riot Car and future firepower to destroy all criminal elements and their operations.

Ultra Cop aims to provide a classic action experience from the 6th Generation of gaming, hearkening back to a time when gaming was simpler.

A quick pickup and play experience, designed to be completed within a single sitting.

FEATURES:

  • Four unique scenarios with multiple objectives and threat types

  • Intense action with visceral effects

  • Pick up enemies/objects and throw them into hazards

  • Rescue innocent babes!

  • Switch between first and third person perspectives

  • Distinct Y2K gaming aesthetic from 1999

  • Command friendly squad AI

  • Four unique and era appropriate Soundtracks to choose from

  • Shorter format with an emphasis on replayability

content_descriptors.notes: While Ultra Cop is a low poly game, it does contain Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language and Partial Nudity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600 3.40GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NIVIDIA GeForce GTX 750ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please keep in mind that even though this game emulates a retro aesthetic, it still runs on a modern graphics engine.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A challenging retro arcade FPS/TPS straight from the late '90s. The Crime Wars have started and it's up to the Ultra Cops to bring back ultimate justice. Use Mechs, Riot Cars and serious firepower to bring the pain to the criminal underworld in this 6th Generation Y2K inspired game.
